name: Allison Of Astra: Allison's Booty Quest (S1 E4)
name_original: Allison Of Astra: Allison's Booty Quest (S1 E4)
description:
Did you ever wish you could stomp on ANYTHING, no matter how spiky? Live out those fantasies when Allison meets Booty the living shoe in the series' first PLATFORMER episode!

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure for your NES, plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
